sentences.en: A dirty cut may become septic , ie affected by bacteria.
A dirty cut may go septic.
sentences.cn: 伤口不干净容易受感染。

sentences.en: A flake of plaster from the ceiling fell into his eye, which became septic.
sentences.cn: 天花板上的一小片熟石膏掉到他眼里，致使他的眼睛感染了。

sentences.en: A rare case of a single orthotopic ureterocele in a septic child is presented.
sentences.cn: 有一小孩,因单一正位的输尿管囊肿,造成严重败血症.

sentences.en: An electrically heated septic tank has been developed.
sentences.cn: 曾设计了一种电热化尸池.

sentences.en: Charlie : [ From Trailer ] I put him in the septic tank.
sentences.cn: ( 从预告片上 ) 我把他丢进了化粪池里.

sentences.en: Eliminate seepage from cisterns, cesspools, and septic tanks.
sentences.cn: 消除渗漏水箱, 污水池, 化粪池.

sentences.en: I plant based on market demand, developed a whole new generation of glassreinforced plastic septic tanks.
sentences.cn: 我厂根据市场需求, 研制开发新一代玻璃钢整体化粪池.

sentences.en: Not everyone who has a fever is septic!
sentences.cn: 不是所有的发热都与败血症有关!

sentences.en: Persistent bacteremia often leads to severe sepsis or overwhelming septic shock.
sentences.cn: 持续性的菌血症经常导致严重的败血症,甚至恶化为败血性休克.

sentences.en: Put some anti-septic cream on it.
sentences.cn: 涂上一些防止败血症的药膏。

sentences.en: Scarlet fever and septic angina, also may be caused by streptococcus infection.
sentences.cn: 猩红热和脓毒性咽喉炎一样, 也可能由链球菌感染引发.

sentences.en: Septic emboli from the vegetation will possibly result in systemic thromboembolism with multiple organ infarction.
sentences.cn: 另外细菌赘生物所掉落的感染性血栓也可能导致全身性的血栓栓塞,进一步导致多重器官衰竭.

sentences.en: Septic shock is a life - threatening condition.
sentences.cn: 感染性休克是致命性疾病.

sentences.en: Treatment of septic shock is properly based on prevention.
sentences.cn: 感染性休克的真正治疗在于预防.

words.tran_cn: 败血症，[医] 脓毒病；腐败作用
败血症的；[医]脓毒性的；腐败的

phrases.tran_cn: 感染性休克；败血性休克；脓毒性休克

trans.tran_en: a wound or part of your body that is septic is infected with  bacteria
